activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10924
activity.text:
Hello @rithviknishad, 
There is is npm package named [i18n-unused](https://www.npmjs.com/package/i18n-unused) using this we can create a script to remove the unused keys.
To prevent this in future we can add this script CI/CD integration.

activity.text: Hi, @Jeffrin2005 I have checked for the issue, I am not able to find any icon name "Edit2" in UniconPaths.json file Instead there is another for "l-edit" named "l-edit-alt" which is viewed as - Please let me know if I missed something.
